101.comments: ATSC 113 has no required class meetings for any of the 2020 winter-term sections: 101, 201, 99A  and  99C. This is a fully online course.Please refer to the following website to learn more about this course: https://www.eoas.ubc.ca/courses/atsc113/

description: Atmospheric-science principles elucidated by case studies applied to snow sports, sailing, surfing, soaring, and flying.
